summary: A fully modular crafting station resource.
descriptionHtml:
Modular Crafting Table
Version 1.1

This is a small project I started, mainly to learn a bit more about NifSkope and Blender. The result is a rather nice crafting table resource with the following features:

[list]
[*] Fully modular, Mix-and-Match different table components
[*] Snap seamlessly together in the CS
[*] All crafting stations have working furniture markers
[*] Crafting Stations and Drawers are fully animated
[*] All elements have proper collision
[*] Uses only vanilla textures, to benefit from texture replacers
[*] Fits nicely with the \'UpperClass\' furniture set[/list]

Note: The staff enchanter model requires the Dragonborn DLC for some of the textures

Permissions:
You are free to use this resource and any of it\'s parts in any way you like, no further permission needed.
author: Tueffel
